SA15bsa0553u:2_0: yatsattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmīvivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:2_3: na ca virudvānaikāntikate / vyāpakānupalambhātmanā viparyyayabādhakapramāṇena vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0553u:2_5: na punaḥ kāraṇagatau kāryyagatau vā kramākramāvasya vyāpakau /
SA15bsa0553u:2_8: tasmāt kāraṇagatayā kramākramikāryyaviṣayatayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇaśaktiḥ kramākramavyāptetyucyate /
SA15bsa0553u:2_9: viṣayeṇa viṣayinirddeśāt / vyavahāralāghavārthaṃ / tataśca yadyapi sarvvatra kramākramau sattvasya vyāpakāvityādyucyate /
SA15bsa0553u:3_2: pitṛputratvavat / kaḥ punarasau vyāptiprasādhako vyāpakānupalambha iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:3_4: na tat śaktaṃ, yathā śaśaviṣāṇaṃ / nāsti ca nityābhimatasya bhāvasya kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvamiti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:3_6: nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvena vyāpakena saha virodhasadbhāvāt,
SA15bsa0553u:3_7: tathā hi pūrvvāparakālayorekatve nityatvaṃ kṣaṇadvayepi bhede kramākramitvaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:3_13: tathā hi na tāvat kramākramābhyāmanyaḥ prakārosti,
SA15bsa0553u:3_22: asyāpyanekadoṣaduṣṭatvāt / tathāhi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi pramāṇasidvatvāt,
SA15bsa0553u:3_26: pratīti rhi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:3_27: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:3_30: antimapakṣe tu na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syāt vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:3_31: api ca tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
SA15bsa0553u:3_32: liṅgajanma vā, saṃskārajaṃ vā, sandigdhavastukaṃ vā, avastukaṃ vā / tatrādyapakṣadvaye 'kṣaṇikasya sattaivābyāhatā kathaṃ vādhakāvatāraḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:3_36: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa0553u:5_2: tadvaikalyañcāsāmarthyaṃ / na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāntadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ,
SA15bsa0553u:7_1: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśe ṣāṇi kāryyāṇi kuryyāditi cet /
SA15bsa0553u:8_1: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet /
SA15bsa0553u:8_3: tasya tādavasthyāt / atādavasthye vā tadevāsya kṣaṇikatvaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:9_0: atrocyate / satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryyañjanayati na tu tenaiva /
SA15bsa0553u:10_1: ye hi kāryyamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryyotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kāryye 'nuvarttamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
SA15bsa0553u:10_3: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva karttāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryyaṃ vidadyuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:10_4: kintarhi vyāpārāveśinaḥ / na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na karttāraḥ svarūpakārakatvanirvvāhaparatayā vyāpārasamāveśāditi /
SA15bsa0553u:11_0: kiñca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca satvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatirekopyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:11_4: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisidviḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:11_6: kiñca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati nāpyanumānataḥ,
SA15bsa0553u:12_2: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu brūvata vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:12_4: ato vyāpteranaikāntikatvam / api ca kimidaṃ vādhakamakṣaṇikānāmasattāṃ sādha yati,
SA15bsa0553u:12_8: na ca dvitīyaḥ / yato vyāpakanivṛttisahitā vyāpyanivṛttirvyatirekaśabdasyārthaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:12_9: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā tadvetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:12_11: atha sā vikalpyate / tadā pūrvvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpyo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:12_15: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakya iti /
SA15bsa0553u:13_3: yathā tuhinadahanayoḥ sāpekṣadhruvabhāvayośca pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:14_0: atha kālpanikaṃ / tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ kālpaniko vā /
SA15bsa0553u:14_3: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti /
SA15bsa0553u:15_1: hetoḥ svānubhavasya cākṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15bsa0553u:15_2: śūnyaśca dvitīyena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasidvirasatā śakyā kramāderapīti /
SA15bsa0553u:16_0: atrocyate / iha vastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭoyathā gavi gotvaṃ,
SA15bsa0553u:16_2: avastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vakratvābhāvo gagaṇāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
SA15bsa0553u:16_4: āhosvidavastudharmmeṇāpi / prathamapakṣe sidvasādhanaṃ dvitīyapakṣe tu svavacanavirodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:18_1: yenaiva hi vacanenāvastuno dharmmitvābhāvena dharmmeṇa dharmmatvamabhyupagataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:18_3: tathāhyavastuno dharmmitvannāstīti vacanena dharmmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastu vidhīyate,
SA15bsa0553u:18_4: anyatra vā, na vā kvacidapīti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:19_3: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāt iti kathamavastuno dharmmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:19_6: tathāvastuno dharmmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmmitvasvīkārapūrvvatvena vyāptaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:19_10: atha na vyāpakadharmmaḥ / tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanavirodhasidviḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:19_12: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ pariharttumiti mahati saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:19_13: avastuprastāve sahṛdayāṇāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:19_14: aho mahadvaidagdhyaṃ / avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsarttumicchati /
SA15bsa0553u:19_15: nacāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamarddanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedvuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa0553u:19_16: tataścātrāpi kramākramābhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastyātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmmitvaṃ kena pratihanyate /
SA15bsa0553u:19_17: trividho hi dharmmo dṛṣṭaḥ kaścidvastuniyato nīlādiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:19_21: natvavastudharmmeṇa / vastvavastudharmmeṇa vā / svavacanasyānuyanyāsaprasaṅgādityarkṣāṇakasyābhāve sandehe vāvastudharmmeṇa dharmmitvamavyāhatamiti nāyamāśrayāsidvo vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:20_2: kevalamasau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratīti rvastvavastunorekarūpā na bhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:20_6: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratīti ryathāsākṣātpratyakṣaṃ paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo 'numānañca /
SA15bsa0553u:20_9: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:20_13: tataścākṣaṇikasya vikalpamātrasidvatve yaduktaṃ na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syadvikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāditi tatasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:20_14: vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmmeṇa dharmmitvāyogāt /
SA15bsa0553u:20_17: vikalpaścāyaṃ hetūpanyāsāt / pūrvvaṃ sandigdhavastukaḥ, samarthite tu hetāvavastuka iti brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:21_0: na caiṣa svarūpāsidvaḥ / akṣaṇike dharmmiṇi kramākramayo rvyāpakayorayogāt /
SA15bsa0553u:21_1: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyakāraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
SA15bsa0553u:21_2: samarthasya kṣepāyogāt / atha tadā sahakārisākalyalakṣaṇasāmarthyaṃ nāsti /
SA15bsa0553u:21_4: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15bsa0553u:21_6: yadā tāvadamī mīlitāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu ko ni ṣedvā /
SA15bsa0553u:22_1: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryyotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat /
SA15bsa0553u:22_2: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatte rnavā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryyotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati /
SA15bsa0553u:23_2: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñānadūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasidvidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryyaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:24_1: na tu kāryyotpattihetuḥ / yasmāddvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukañcasahakāryyantaraṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:24_3: bhavatu tāvannijāgantukabhedena dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tathāpi tatprātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
SA15bsa0553u:24_4: tadyadi prāgapi, prāgapi kāryyaprasaṅgaḥ / atha paścādeva na tadā śthirobhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:25_0: na ca kāryyaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:25_1: tasyāsattvāt / hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryyannakaroti tadā tatkāryyameva tanna syāt,
SA15bsa0553u:25_2: svātantryāt / yaccoktaṃ / yo 'hyuttarakāryyajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
SA15bsa0553u:25_5: tadasaṅgataṃ / sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālamevedaṃ kāryyannapūrvvakālamiti kuta etat /
SA15bsa0553u:25_7: kiṃ kurmma uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:25_9: śthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryyaṃ karotīti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:25_10: na / pramāṇavādhite svabhāvābhyupagamāyogāditi na tāvadakṣaṇikasya kramikāryyakāritvamasti /
SA15bsa0553u:25_13: kāryye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:25_14: na / sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvamavāryyamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt /
SA15bsa0553u:25_15: kāryyasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ karttumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati /
SA15bsa0553u:25_17: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:25_22: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatvepyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati /
SA15bsa0553u:25_23: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ byāptamiti kramākramayoranyo 'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:26_2: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścit vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vikalpādeva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:26_4: evaṃ vaidharmmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratītiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:26_8: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiñca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāt iti sthitaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:27_0: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātrantadā na tasya sādhyabudvijanakatvamavastutvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:27_1: na cānyopalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhirabhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivat anyasya kasyacidanupalabdheriti cet tadasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:27_3: yathā neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhirdṛśyānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:27_4: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhireva śiṃśapābhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:27_5: tathā hi nityasya dharmmiṇo vikalpabudvyadhyavasi tasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇameva kramikāritvā kramikāritvānupalambha arthakriyāpekṣayā ca /
SA15bsa0553u:28_5: ayañca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmmiṇi tathāvastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:28_9: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmmiṇā sārdvaṃ ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye 'pi yadi bhavataḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:28_10: nityagrāhiṇā jñānena svadharmmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti sambhāvanayā /
SA15bsa0553u:28_13: yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:28_17: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryyaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatayā durvvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:30_0: yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāśca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastuprativadvatvamapi na kṣīṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:30_1: na ca dvitīye 'pi pakṣe doṣaḥ sambhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:30_5: paryyudāsavṛttyā budvisvabhāva bhūtā kṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmmiṇi prativadvatvasambhavāt /
SA15bsa0553u:31_0: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:31_1: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādityādyantarbhāvayituṃ śakyo na tathāyamiti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:32_3: tadvālasyāpi durabhidhānaṃ / nityo hi dharmmī / asattvaṃ sādhyaṃ / kramikāryyakāritvākramikāryyakāritvaviraho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:32_6: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisidvau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhakāt pratyakṣādanumānātmakādvā pramāṇāntarāt sidva miti netaretarāśrayatvadoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:33_0: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaprasaṅgo bhinna nyāyatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:34_2: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmmā heturavastuni vikalpamātrasidve dharmmiṇi nāśrayāsidvidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:35_4: asti ca / ato yathā pramāṇābhāve 'pi vikalpasatvasya bandhyāsutādeḥsaundaryyādiniṣedho 'nurūpaḥ,
SA15bsa0553u:35_5: tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇika svarūpasya tat pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:36_2: na hi virodhonāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādaṃ sambadvābhidhānamiṣyate 'smābhirupapadyate vā /
SA15bsa0553u:36_7: nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yamanayorasaṅkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:36_10: nanu nityatvakramayaugapadyavattvañca virudvau vidhūya nāparo virodhonāma /
SA15bsa0553u:36_11: kasya vāstavatvamiti cet / na / na hi dharmmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:36_12: kintu virudvayordharmmayoḥ sadbhāve 'nyathā virodhanāmadharmmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na virudvau dharmmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasadbhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:36_13: virudvau ca dharmmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:37_1: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15bsa0553u:37_2: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattāpi sattāyathā
SA15bsa0553u:40_2: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikādvinivarttamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva eva viśrāmyante na vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviṃravirodhinī /
